How to Redeem Codes for Pet Star Simulator

You can easily redeem codes and get rewards in most Roblox games, including Pet Star Simulator . You just need to go to the Store, which is always available in the game interface. However, if you are inexperienced with Roblox games and need help redeeming them, you should use the step-by-step guide below.

  • Next, pay attention to the right side of the screen, where the Store button is located.

After that, you should get a notification with the received reward. But if this does not happen, or if you get an error message, check the spelling and whether you have entered an extra space, as these are some of the most common mistakes when redeeming codes. Keep in mind that many Roblox codes are time-limited by the developers, so hurry up and redeem them to get your rewards while they are still valid.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 Has Great News For PC Players
item.description:
Summary

  • Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 will soon support official modding on PC, allowing modders to enhance gameplay.
  • Modders have already fixed game issues in KCD2, but await official tools to take mods to the next level.
  • The release date for the modding tools has not been announced.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 has announced that it will soon be getting official modding support on the PC version of the game. This will allow creators to take Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 mods to the next level when the tools are released.

Modding was an important part of the original Kingdom Come: Deliverance on PC, with tons of talented modders producing content for the game. This has quickly translated to the sequel, with Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 modders already fixing some of the game's most frustrating features. While this is great to see, modders are ultimately limited by the tools they have at their disposal. Right now, they're essentially flying blind and still creating awesome mods, so it will be interesting to see how it evolves when they have the official modding tools.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 announced the upcoming addition of official modding support on Steamworks in a post on X, which features a horse colored blue and purple, with protagonist Henry holding a fish instead of a sword. This is just a tiny glimpse into the type of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 mods that fans will be able to create upon the release of these modding tools. Given the post only mentions Steamworks, it seems these tools will be for PC only, although it's unclear if mods will eventually come to consoles, with more games like Baldur's Gate 3 and Starfield supporting this of late.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is Getting Official Modding Support on PC

Unfortunately, further details about the official modding tools were absent. No date was provided for when fans could expect to get their hands on them, with only the instruction to "stay tuned." It's worth noting that mod tools for the original Kingdom Come: Deliverance were released almost two years after the launch of the base game, so it's a good sign to see the equivalent announced for the sequel just a release after launch. This allows Warhorse Studios to keep the momentum rolling after Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 's successful launch.

Modding tools are just one element of Warhorse Studios' post-launch support for Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 . The developer has already announced three expansions for Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 , which are all set for release this year. The game has already made its budget back, making it one of 2025's first big success stories. It's an exciting period for fans of the game, and by the looks of things, it's only set to get better.

item.title: Jujutsu Odyssey: How to Find Glasses
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Start the Arai Quest in Jujutsu Odyssey
  • Where to Find Arai's Glasses in Jujutsu Odyssey

Jujutsu Odyssey features a large number of quests that you need to complete in order to earn EXP. Some require players to defeat certain mobs, while others require the locating of various items, and the latter can be quite useful.

One of the NPCs in the starting location will ask you to find his glasses. Even though this may seem like a simple quest, it is actually quite difficult to complete. And the reason for this is that the item you need is almost impossible to spot from afar. For those struggling, here's how to find glasses in Jujutsu Odyssey .

How to Start the Arai Quest in Jujutsu Odyssey

When starting your adventure in Jujutsu Odyssey , your first quest will be to reach level 20. To do this, players must complete quests at the starting location, and if you look between the buildings of Sendai High, you will find an NPC named Arai.

As strange as it may sound, this guy is blind and needs glasses to go to the cinema. However, Matsuda hid his glasses somewhere in the school, leaving players to find them for Arai.

Where to Find Arai's Glasses in Jujutsu Odyssey

Most Jujutsu Odyssey players will probably start their hunt for the glasses by searching the entire territory of Sendai High, but they will still not find the glasses. Luckily, completing Arai's quest in this Roblox game is much easier than it may seem; you just need to talk to the NPC again .

After you start the quest, you can still interact with Arai. Upon interacting with him for a second time, he will give you more precise instructions, namely that Matsuda hid his glasses somewhere on the soccer field . This is the same field near which the JaQuavious NPC stands.

It is important to note that Arai's glasses are quite small, which makes them difficult to spot from afar. Therefore, we recommend that you check the entire field carefully by looking under your feet.

Often, the glasses can be found inside the left gate on the soccer field in Jujutsu Odyssey . Also, beware of enemies, as they will begin to chase and attack you if you get too close to them. This is especially true for the Delinquent, which is quite strong.

When you finally find the glasses in Jujutsu Odyssey , all you have to do is return to Arai. As a reward for your help, he grants you 575 EXP and 405 Gold .

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - How To Romance Characters
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How Does Romance Work In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2
  • Romance With Maids At The Bathhouse In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2
  • How To Make Henry Better At Romance In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is a highly dynamic game, where players can approach quests, dialogue, and exploration in their own way. Among the many choices to be made, Henry can attempt to romance certain characters, which in some cases will merely lead to a night of fun , (often a hidden cutscene where time is advanced).

At other times, romance in KCD2 can be a little more nuanced and Henry can truly win the affections of some characters . As a warning, a few romances also lead to cutscenes with nudity.

How Does Romance Work In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

For the most part, romance in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 isn't something players can just set off and do. The romanceable characters mostly appear during the main quests , however, there are often no quest markers indicating these opportunities.

Instead, players will have to listen to characters calling out for Henry , such as when Doubravka's mother asks him to dance with her daughter during the Wedding Crashers quest. Alternatively, players can be proactive and try talking to more characters.

Making The Right Dialogue Choices & Skill Checks

Romancing these characters often comes down to Henry's dialogue choices and his actions. Try to gauge characters and answer with what you think they'd like to hear , and this will often be the correct choice.

Unfortunately, the player's choice won't always be enough , as in this highly immersive game, the same line spoken by a scholar and an uneducated version of Henry come across completely differently.

In other words, Henry will often have to pass skill checks in order to romance:

  • Persuasion/Speech: Via eloquence, Henry will attempt to persuade. This is mostly derived from his Speech stat, but to a lesser extent his Charisma.
  • Impression/Charisma: Henry will attempt to impress. His reputation and Charisma are most important here, but his Speech stat also helps a little.
  • Scholarship: Using his Scholarship skill, Henry can try to win affection with his impressive knowledge.

Not all of these options will always be available, and nor should players always pick the one with the highest score . The recipient also matters. For example, it would be much harder to use Scholarship in conversation with a highly educated character.

The Liberal Arts Scholarship Perk can help with this by displaying if the options are easy, medium, or hard . However, this only highlights the difficulty of the skill check and the listener, not Henry's chances of succeeding. If it says 'Easy' for Impression/Charisma, but Henry has an awful reputation and Charisma, this might fail .

Look For The Heart & Hands Icon In Dialogue

In some situations, players may be unaware if their attempts at romancing are succeeding , or even if they are talking to a romanceable character.

However, if a red heart icon with two hands ever appears, then click this for romance. Often, this is the final agreement to romance , but in some cases, it can also be the first subtle move in more drawn-out romances.

Completing Small Tasks For Romance

Sometimes, characters will ask Henry to complete small optional objectives, such as picking flowers . As romance is often tied to main quests, make sure to c omplete them before time runs out or before finishing the major objectives.

Romance With Maids At The Bathhouse In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

Of course, if Henry constantly fails at romance or simply wants more, he can always pay for a few hours of relaxation at a bathhouse.

To do so, talk to the proprietor of the baths. Instead of simply asking for a hot bath or to have Henry's wounds healed, ask for:

  • ' I'd like the full service and some pleasant company. '

This will cost Henry around 65 Groschen , but remember to haggle to lower the price.

After all such encounters, Henry will receive the Time Well Spent buff , granting him +1 Strength, Agility, and Vitality .

How To Make Henry Better At Romance In Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2

While romance is mostly down to player choices, they can improve their chances of success by making Henry better at romance in KCD2 .

The aim is to improve his Charisma, Reputation, Speech, and Scholarship. This can be done with specialized Perks, stat farming, fancy attire, and good hygiene.

Best Perks For Romance

  • Good Natured: +2 Persuasion.
  • Pacifist: Bonus to non-combat skills.
  • Jack of All Trades: +2 to all skill checks.
  • Ladies' Man: +2 to all skill checks with women.
  • Charming Companion: +3 Charisma when you have a dog.
  • Liberal Arts: Shows skill check difficulties.
  • Flower Power: +2 Charisma when carrying 30+ herbs.

Clothes, Hygiene, & Perfume For Romance

Dressing for the occasion in Tier 3 fancy clothes with high Charisma is an easy way to make Henry more appealing , although enough Groschen is needed of course. Players should make sure that these clothes are repaired and washed , and Henry himself should be clean too. This all affects his Charisma .

Lastly, there are many perfumes in KCD2 that can temporarily enhance his Charisma , but be careful not to wear multiple at once. These can be bought or crafted via alchemy . The following potions can also be useful before talking to a potential partner.

  • Fox : Increases Speech
  • Lion : Temporarily increases Charisma

item.title: How Mario Kart 9 Could Draw Influences from the Series' Biggest Milestones
item.description:
As it stands, the Mario Kart series is one of Nintendo's biggest franchises, and Mario Kart 9 is poised to be another big hit. In particular, a few specific games evolved the series in significant ways and helped set the stage for Mario Kart 9 's likely success. Ahead of Mario Kart 9 's release, it's worth looking back at those games and remembering how much has changed since the days of Super Mario Kart .

The Switch 2's Mario Kart was the first title officially announced for the console, and for good reason. Since the Super Nintendo, every major Nintendo console, except for the Game Boy, has received a new Mario Kart game, from Super Mario Kart on the SNES to Mario Kart 8 Deluxe on the Switch. Admittedly, the latter was an updated version of Mario Kart 8 for the Wii U, but it eventually added what is practically an entire new game's worth of content through the Booster Course Pass. A new Mario Kart game coming out for Nintendo's next console was practically a foregone conclusion.

Mario Kart Has Grown in a Few Very Important Ways Throughout its History

Mario Kart: Double Dash Expanded the Roster For the First Time

Long before the days of Mario Kart 9 's expansive roster, the series had rosters of just eight racers. Mario Kart: Double Dash changed that with its roster of twenty drivers, 16 of which were on the base roster and four of which were unlockable racers. While the roster size was partially due to the game's gimmick of two racers per kart, the unlockable characters were a completely new addition to the franchise. After that, bigger rosters became a mainstay for the series, eventually leading to 12 racers on the track at a time. Mario Kart 9 looks to raise that number to 24.

Double Dash Also Gave Players Their First Kart Choice

Mario Kart: Double Dash also paved the way for Mario Kart 's kart customization. Previously, the player could only choose racers with unique stats, and they all drove recolored versions of the same kart. However, Double Dash introduced a wide variety of karts from which players could choose, including karts based on every character and a Parade Kart. This would be the starting point for what would eventually become the more in-depth customization that first appeared in Mario Kart 7 . With players having so many combinations at their disposal now, Mario Kart 9 has a great base for its own custom builds.

Mario Kart DS Started the Tradition of Retro Tracks

One exciting part of every new title in the series is seeing Mario Kart 's retro tracks. Retro tracks are remade versions of tracks from previous games, and they are often popular ones, such as Waluigi Pinball and Baby Park. Mario Kart DS was the first game in the series to implement retro tracks as a mechanic, having four cups worth of them alongside the game's new tracks. Since then, each game has brought back their fair share of retro tracks, with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe going above and beyond with its Booster Course Pass. Mario Kart 9 's selection of retro tracks will likely be a hot topic once more.

While not officially deemed retro tracks, Super Mario Kart 's courses were unlockable in Mario Kart: Super Circuit as extra tracks.

The Mario Kart series has come a long way, and a few new moves in Mario Kart 9 are not out of the question. After all, were it not for the innovations of past games, some of the series' best features might never have come to pass. Mario Kart 8 Deluxe benefited heavily from all of these advancements, and it ended up being the highest-selling game in the series. Mario Kart 9 is in a great place to thrive thanks to the series' past.
